sql:
CREATE TABLE "fileEmbeddings" (
	"vaultId" text NOT NULL,
	"fileId" text NOT NULL,
	"chunkId" uuid NOT NULL,
	"embedding" vector(1536),
	"createdAt" timestamp DEFAULT now() NOT NULL,
	CONSTRAINT "fileEmbeddings_vaultId_fileId_chunkId_pk" PRIMARY KEY("vaultId","fileId","chunkId")
);

CREATE TABLE "files" (
	"id" text PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
	"name" text NOT NULL,
	"extension" text NOT NULL,
	"vaultId" text NOT NULL,
	"lastModified" timestamp DEFAULT now() NOT NULL,
	"embeddingStatus" text DEFAULT 'in_progress' NOT NULL,
	"embeddingTaskId" text
);

CREATE TABLE "notes" (
	"id" text PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
	"content" text NOT NULL,
	"color" text NOT NULL,
	"createdAt" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"accessedAt" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"dropped" boolean DEFAULT false NOT NULL,
	"fileId" text NOT NULL,
	"vaultId" text NOT NULL,
	"reasoningId" text NOT NULL,
	"steering" jsonb NOT NULL,
	"embeddingStatus" text DEFAULT 'in_progress' NOT NULL,
	"embeddingTaskId" text
);

CREATE TABLE "reasonings" (
	"id" text PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
	"content" text NOT NULL,
	"fileId" text NOT NULL,
	"vaultId" text NOT NULL,
	"noteIds" text[] NOT NULL,
	"createdAt" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"accessedAt" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"duration" integer NOT NULL,
	"steering" jsonb NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE "tasks" (
	"id" text PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
	"status" text DEFAULT 'in_progress' NOT NULL,
	"createdAt" timestamp NOT NULL,
	"completedAt" timestamp,
	"error" text
);

CREATE TABLE "vaults" (
	"id" text PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
	"name" text NOT NULL,
	"lastOpened" timestamp DEFAULT now() NOT NULL,
	"tree" jsonb NOT NULL,
	"settings" jsonb NOT NULL,
	"rootPath" text NOT NULL
);
ALTER TABLE "fileEmbeddings" ADD CONSTRAINT "fileEmbeddings_vaultId_vaults_id_fk" FOREIGN KEY ("vaultId") REFERENCES "public"."vaults"("id") ON DELETE cascade ON UPDATE no action;
ALTER TABLE "fileEmbeddings" ADD CONSTRAINT "fileEmbeddings_fileId_files_id_fk" FOREIGN KEY ("fileId") REFERENCES "public"."files"("id") ON DELETE cascade ON UPDATE no action;
ALTER TABLE "files" ADD CONSTRAINT "files_vaultId_vaults_id_fk" FOREIGN KEY ("vaultId") REFERENCES "public"."vaults"("id") ON DELETE cascade ON UPDATE no action;
ALTER TABLE "files" ADD CONSTRAINT "files_embeddingTaskId_tasks_id_fk" FOREIGN KEY ("embeddingTaskId") REFERENCES "public"."tasks"("id") ON DELETE no action ON UPDATE no action;
ALTER TABLE "noteEmbeddings" ADD CONSTRAINT "noteEmbeddings_noteId_notes_id_fk" FOREIGN KEY ("noteId") REFERENCES "public"."notes"("id") ON DELETE cascade ON UPDATE no action;
ALTER TABLE "notes" ADD CONSTRAINT "notes_fileId_files_id_fk" FOREIGN KEY ("fileId") REFERENCES "public"."files"("id") ON DELETE cascade ON UPDATE no action;
ALTER TABLE "notes" ADD CONSTRAINT "notes_vaultId_vaults_id_fk" FOREIGN KEY ("vaultId") REFERENCES "public"."vaults"("id") ON DELETE cascade ON UPDATE no action;
ALTER TABLE "notes" ADD CONSTRAINT "notes_reasoningId_reasonings_id_fk" FOREIGN KEY ("reasoningId") REFERENCES "public"."reasonings"("id") ON DELETE cascade ON UPDATE no action;
ALTER TABLE "notes" ADD CONSTRAINT "notes_embeddingTaskId_tasks_id_fk" FOREIGN KEY ("embeddingTaskId") REFERENCES "public"."tasks"("id") ON DELETE no action ON UPDATE no action;
ALTER TABLE "reasonings" ADD CONSTRAINT "reasonings_fileId_files_id_fk" FOREIGN KEY ("fileId") REFERENCES "public"."files"("id") ON DELETE cascade ON UPDATE no action;
ALTER TABLE "reasonings" ADD CONSTRAINT "reasonings_vaultId_vaults_id_fk" FOREIGN KEY ("vaultId") REFERENCES "public"."vaults"("id") ON DELETE cascade ON UPDATE no action;
CREATE INDEX "file_ipIndex_hnsw" ON "fileEmbeddings" USING hnsw ("embedding" vector_ip_ops) WITH (m=16,ef_construction=50);
CREATE INDEX "idx_files_vault_filename" ON "files" USING btree ("vaultId","name");
CREATE INDEX "note_ipIndex_hnsw" ON "noteEmbeddings" USING hnsw ("embedding" vector_ip_ops) WITH (m=16,ef_construction=50);
CREATE INDEX "idx_notes_vault_filename" ON "notes" USING btree ("vaultId","fileId");
CREATE INDEX "idx_notes_reasoning" ON "notes" USING btree ("reasoningId");
CREATE INDEX "idx_reasonings_vault_filename" ON "reasonings" USING btree ("vaultId","fileId");
ALTER TABLE "notes" ALTER COLUMN "steering" DROP NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE "reasonings" ALTER COLUMN "steering" DROP NOT NULL;
